summary: This script executes unloadram.sh, creates a ramdisk directory, sets its permissions to 777, and mounts a tmpfs filesystem named "myramdisk" with 10MiB size into the ramdisk directory.

details.comment: This script executes unloadram.sh, creates a ramdisk directory, sets its permissions to 777, and mounts a tmpfs filesystem named "myramdisk" with 10MiB size into the ramdisk directory.
details.content:
#!/bin/bash
./unloadram.sh
sudo mkdir ramdisk
sudo chmod 777 ramdisk
sudo mount -t tmpfs -o size=10m myramdisk ramdisk
